CalculateSignificance.h

00001 
00002 //                                              //
00003 //  Inclusive  secondary vertex analysis        //
00004 //  Libov Vladyslav                             //
00005 //  DESY                                                         //
00006 //  libov@mail.desy.de                          //
00007 //  July 2009                                   //
00008 //                                              //
00010 Float_t NtupleAnalyzer::CalculateSignificance(Int_t     vertex)
00011 {
00012         Float_t         Xsv=Vtxsec_x[vertex];
00013         Float_t         Ysv=Vtxsec_y[vertex];
00014         Float_t         Zsv=Vtxsec_z[vertex];
00015 
00016         if ((Xsv==666)||(Ysv==666)||(Zsv==666)) return (-999);
00017 
00018         Float_t         deltaX=Xsv-Bspt_x;
00019         Float_t         deltaY=Ysv-Bspt_y;
00020 
00021         Float_t         DecayLength=TMath::Sqrt(deltaX*deltaX+deltaY*deltaY);
00022         if (DecayLength>1.) return (-998);
00023         if (Zsv>30.)    return (-998);
00024 
00025         Float_t         ProjectedDecayLength=0;
00026 
00027         Int_t                   jet=vertex;
00028 
00029         Float_t         PhiJet=Kt_phijet_a[jet];
00030         Float_t         EtaJet=Kt_etajet_a[jet];
00031         Float_t         ThetaJet=2*TMath::ATan(TMath::Exp(-EtaJet));
00032         Float_t         SinThetaJet=TMath::Sin(ThetaJet);
00033         Float_t         SinPhiJet=TMath::Sin(PhiJet);
00034         Float_t         CosPhiJet=TMath::Cos(PhiJet);
00035         ProjectedDecayLength=deltaX*SinThetaJet*CosPhiJet+deltaY*SinThetaJet*SinPhiJet;
00036 
00037         Float_t ProjectedDecayLengthError=0;
00038 
00039         Float_t d1=SinThetaJet*CosPhiJet;
00040         Float_t d2=SinThetaJet*SinPhiJet;
00041         Float_t sigma_x=TMath::Sqrt(Vtxsec_cov[vertex][0]);
00042         Float_t sigma_y=TMath::Sqrt(Vtxsec_cov[vertex][2]);
00043 
00044         ProjectedDecayLengthError=TMath::Sqrt(d1*d1*(sigma_x*sigma_x+Bspt_xer*Bspt_xer)+d2*d2*(sigma_y*sigma_y+Bspt_yer*Bspt_yer)+d1*d2*Vtxsec_cov[vertex][1]);
00045 
00046         Float_t         Significance=0;
00047         Significance=ProjectedDecayLength/ProjectedDecayLengthError;
00048         return          Significance;
00049 }
